summary: In a corrupt, greed-fueled world, a powerful alchemist leads a messianic character and seven materialistic figures to the Holy Mountain, where they hope to achieve enlightenment.
cast: Alejandro Jodorowsky|Horacio Salinas|Zamira Saunders|Juan Ferrara|Adriana Page|Burt Kleiner|Valerie Jodorowsky|Nicky Nichols|Richard Rutowski|Luis Lomelí|Ana De Sade|Chucho-Chucho|Letícia Robles|Connie De La Mora|David Kapralik|Jacqueline Voltaire|Pablo Leder|Bobby Cameron|Re Debris|Lupita Peruyero|José Antonio Alcaraz|Héctor Ortega|Robert Taicher|Harry Cohn|Arielle Dombasle|Manuel Dondé|Ramiro Chávez Gochicoa|Basilio González|Marcela López Rey|Jane Mitchell|Marcela Ponzarelli|David Silva
title: La montaña sagrada
